scripts.publish: zip -9 -r function.zip node_modules package.json -x node_modules/typescript/\* -x node_modules/tsup/\* -x node_modules/@types/\* -x node_modules/@highlight-run/rrweb/node_modules/typescript/\* && cd dist && zip ../function.zip * && cd .. && aws s3 cp function.zip s3://highlight-lambda-code/session-screenshots.zip && rm function.zip && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name session-screenshots --s3-bucket highlight-lambda-code --s3-key session-screenshots.zip
